text:
Ottawa mHealth | Ottawa, ON, Canada | Onsite | Full-time

Ottawa mHealth is a research and development centre at the Ottawa Hospital Research Institute and working out of our office in Hintonburg. We build and evaluate digital applications that help empower the public to manage their own healthcare, and help physicians provide better, more connected care.

We just obtained a new round of funding for the ImmunizeCA project from the Public Health Agency of Canada and are looking to increase our team with an iOS developer and a Full Stack Web Developer.

Detailed job descriptions are available here http://www.immunizeca.ca/en/jobs.

We look forward to hearing from you.
